title: navigator: new navigator_status msg split out of mission_result

conversation.author: dagar
conversation.body:
This is another small step towards turning navigator into a simpler (dumber) mission manager.

The `mission_result` contained a mix of general navigation state feedback and actual mission specifics. Now `mission_result` is dedicated entirely to the actual mission.

issue_comments.author: stale[bot]
issue_comments.body: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. Thank you for your contributions.
